gatewayTimestamp.description: Timestamp upon receipt at the gateway. If present, this property will be overwritten by the gateway; submitters are not intended to populate this property.

message.description: Contains all properties from the materialcollected event and the materialreward from the mission event in the client's journal minus Localised strings and the properties marked below as 'disallowed'

system.description: Must be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

region.description: Must be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

systemAddress.description: Should be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

collectedFrom.description: Should be added by the sender depending on the event type and response

category.description: Must be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

journalName.description: Must be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

count.description: Must be added by the sender if not present in the journal event

latitude.description: Not included in the event, should be added by the sender if present in status.json

longitude.description: Not included in the event, should be added by the sender if present in status.json
